C45306SUBSTANCE

title.value: PQ/CMC Drug Substance Product Indicator Terminology

publisher.value: Food and Drug Administration (FDA) and the National Cancer Institute's Thesaurus (NCIt)

description.value: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to drug substance product indicators in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.
